tasks: Helped migrate older Operations Dashboard over to newer, micro-services and Cognos based architecture
Developed new dashboard displaying breakdowns of various support KPIs that are tracked by numerous product leaders, using Vue JS, Node JS, and PostgreSQL
Rapidly learned and utilized Cognos Analytics to develop several required dashboards within the team’s tight schedule
Wrote styling guide for DashboardNEXT to ensure harmonized design across all tabs within the dashboard
Joined entirely new team of 6 co-workers to quickly design and develop prototype for upcoming IBM product under tight 3-month deadline
Implemented code generation and pushing services for GitHub and Gitlab using their respective APIs and Node JS
Designed frontend UI using React JS such that design language is consistent with IBM Cloud
Frequently met and communicated with IBM executives and prospective clients to garner constructive feedback and suggestions
